description: This file defines API endpoints for generating and downloading QR codes related to events, including encoding event IDs into QR images and serving them as base64 or downloadables.

methods.name: generate_event_qr( event_id: int, size: int = 256, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Generates a base64 encoded PNG QR code for the specified event ID, encoding the event ID for check-in purposes.

methods.name: download_event_qr( event_id: int, size: int = 256, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Generates and serves the QR code PNG file for download based on the specified event ID.

ctags.name: download_event_qr
ctags.signature: ( event_id: int, size: int = 256, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: generate_event_qr
ctags.signature: ( event_id: int, size: int = 256, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
